de.lessvoid.nifty.node

Class NiftyBackgroundFillNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.node.NiftyBackgroundFillNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NiftyNode

    public final class NiftyBackgroundFillNode
extends Object
implements NiftyNode
    The API for the NiftyBackgroundFillNode. With this node you can change the background color state or the background gradient state as well. A NiftyContentNode will use the current NiftyBackgroundFill state to fill the content node.

    If you specify both, NiftyColor and NiftyLinearGradient then the gradient override the background color.

    Created by void on 09.08.15.
